trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> o l'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> metodo e segnala che ha iniziato il processo di connessione (ad esempio, un utente ha selezionato un controllo e fa clic su un verbo di connessione), ma non è ancora stata completata.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: L'evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare una connessione prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione viene completata correttamente, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> metodo e segnala il fatto che un utente ha fatto clic su un verbo di disconnessione o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> in caso contrario la chiamata a metodo.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: L'evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare il processo di chiusura di una connessione prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione viene chiusa correttamente, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler> delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo specificato nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler> delegato viene chiamato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> viene generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine è possono aggiungere gestori personalizzati per gli eventi aggiungendo il `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` e `OnWebPartsConnecting` gli attributi di `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e l'assegnazione di nomi di metodo personalizzato per gli attributi.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Un gestore personalizzato può essere assegnato anche a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'assegnazione di un gestore eventi a livello di codice, vedere [NIB: procedura: connettere i metodi del gestore eventi agli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
